name: AMO - Detailed Review Text-box Auto Resized
description:
For Firefox 3.6+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds. 

This style auto re-sizes the review text-box on ("addons.mozilla.org") when posting a detail review or editing an review.

Tested on Firefox 3.6+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, Nightly builds.

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
